files.patch:

@@ -453,2 +453,3 @@
-    assert((entry_offset[i] > 0 && entry_offset[i] < cb->insts()->size()) || // Within the adapter blob
-           (entry_offset[i] == -1),                                          // Unset
+    // The entry is within the adapter blob or unset.
+    assert((entry_offset[i] > 0 && entry_offset[i] < cb->insts()->size()) ||
+           (entry_offset[i] == -1),
